sources.name: Global Burden of Disease (2016)
sources.dataPublishedBy: Global Burden of Disease Collaborative Network. Global Burden of Disease Study 2016 (GBD 2016) Results. Seattle, United States: Institute for Health Metrics and Evaluation (IHME), 2017.

fields.name: Number of deaths from malaria (GBD 2016)
fields.description: This is the Global Burden of Disease data of both sexes, all ages, and the absolute number of deaths but now includes data on world regions.
